trans-unit.source: Open **QSTodoListViewController.m** and add the following method.
trans-unit.target: Open **QSTodoListViewController.m** and add the following method.

trans-unit.source: Change _facebook_ to _microsoftaccount_, _twitter_, _google_, or _windowsazureactivedirectory_ if you're not using Facebook as your identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Change _facebook_ to _microsoftaccount_, _twitter_, _google_, or _windowsazureactivedirectory_ if you're not using Facebook as your identity provider.

trans-unit.source: Replace `[self refresh]` in `viewDidLoad` with the following:
trans-unit.target: Replace `[self refresh]` in `viewDidLoad` with the following:

trans-unit.source: Press **Run** to start the app, and then log in.
trans-unit.target: Press **Run** to start the app, and then log in.

trans-unit.source: When you are logged in, you should be able to view the Todo list and make updates.
trans-unit.target: When you are logged in, you should be able to view the Todo list and make updates.
